content:
IRemindable Interface

Definition

Interface that actors must implement to consume reminders registered using RegisterReminderAsync(String, Byte[], TimeSpan, TimeSpan).

In this Article

public interface IRemindable

Methods

ReceiveReminderAsync(String, Byte[], TimeSpan, TimeSpan)

Reminder call back invoked when an actor reminder is triggered.
